Pre-Game Insights: The game between Detroit Pistons and Atlanta Hawks is scheduled for Friday, 7 p.m. EST.
The Pistons finished the previous season with a record of 14-68, while the Hawks ended with 36-46.
Injuries: Bobi Klintman and Ausar Thompson are out for the Pistons due to calf and illness respectively.
De'Andre Hunter, Bogdan Bogdanovic, Trae Young, Kobe Bufkin, and Vit Krejci are day-to-day or out for the Hawks due to knee, hamstring, rib, shoulder, and adductor injuries respectively.
